! Beautiful recently built single-family house in magnificent conditions and high quality! description: Housing located in the metropolitan area of Madrid, in the town of San Martín de la Vega. It has a parking space and storage room in the basement of the building. Municipality that has all the basic services at its fingertips, with a commercial offer (large surfaces and necessary neighborhood stores) and an educational offer, a variety of restaurant services and valued green areas in which to carry out outdoor activities. Terraced house consisting of three floors. To enter the house we find a distributor hall, a bright and spacious living room with air conditioning and direct access to a patio where you can enjoy your free time, to create a relaxation area with the greatest privacy; There is also a fully equipped kitchen, a toilet, and a garage. On the second floor we find a spacious master bedroom with air conditioning and a complete bathroom en suite; It also has three other large bedrooms with fitted wardrobes and a second full bathroom. On the third floor we find a fully equipped attic with an independent entrance that can be used both as a bedroom, as an office or a multipurpose games room with direct access to a wonderful solarium terrace. It has individual natural gas heating, smooth walls, double glazed windows. The house is located in an urbanization with a communal pool and common areas. The area has all the services for day to day, very quiet and close to schools, institutes, clinics, supermarkets, leisure and restaurant areas. DO NOT MISS THIS OPPORTUNITY, COME SEE IT!
